ideas.title: AI Microwave
ideas.description: An #AI #Microwave would know what to #cook without you having to ask.

ideas.title: Opening Door
ideas.description: An #AI #Microwave would automatically open the door for you.

ideas.title: Temp
ideas.description: An #AI #Microwave would know what temp to cook your food at.

ideas.title: Time
ideas.description: An #AI #Microwave would know how long to cook your food.
